mapper.select: SELECT A.* ,B.like_id FROM QNA A LEFT JOIN POPULAR B ON A.QNA_ID = B.CONTENTS_ID AND B.CONTENT_TYPE='qna' AND B.LIKED_USER_EMAIL = #{email} WHERE A.QNA_ID = #{qnaId}
SELECT MAX(QNA_ID) FROM QNA WHERE delete_yn!='Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE created_email=#{email} AND QNA_ID=#{qnaId}

SELECT A.* , (SELECT COUNT(qna_id) FROM COMMENT WHERE qna_id = A.qna_id and delete_yn !='Y') as comment_cnt , C.name , C.avatarUrl FROM QNA A LEFT JOIN USER C ON C.EMAIL = A.CREATED_EMAIL WHERE A.delete_yn!='Y'
